Name: Business Location
Description: A "Business Location" represents any physical location of a business - a store, an office, a campus, a factory, and so on.

Properties.Name: Address
Properties.Description: The street address for this business location

Properties.Name: Closing date
Properties.Description: The date this location closed. Blank if still operating.

Properties.Name: Phone Number
Properties.Description: The phone number for this business location

Properties.Name: Reviews
Properties.Description: Web pages which provide reviews for the business at this location

Properties.Name: Hours
Properties.Description: During what hours is this business location open

Properties.Name: Part of Shopping Center
Properties.Description: Records a relation between the shopping location and the shopping center it is located in.
